programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Αμπερντίν - Ερντριόνιανς
programme.desc: Φάση Ομίλων, 4η Αγωνιστική. Η 79η σεζόν του Premier Sports Cup φιλοξενεί 45 ομάδες και ολοκληρώνεται στις 15 Δεκεμβρίου. Οι Ρέιντζερς είναι οι κάτοχοι του τίτλου. Περιγραφή: Πάρης Τσελεπίδης.

programme.title: Πάντελ: Premier Padel Tour 2024
programme.desc: Μάλαγα. Τελικός Γυναικών. Το Premier Padel είναι η μόνη διοργάνωση που προσφέρει επίσημους πόντους κατάταξης στους παίκτες και τα τουρνουά P1 απονέμουν στους νικητές 1000 πόντους κι ένα μεγάλο χρηματικό έπαθλο. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: Πάντελ: Premier Padel Tour 2024
programme.desc: Μάλαγα. Τελικός Ανδρών. Το Premier Padel είναι η μόνη διοργάνωση που προσφέρει επίσημους πόντους κατάταξης στους παίκτες και τα τουρνουά P1 απονέμουν στους νικητές 1000 πόντους κι ένα μεγάλο χρηματικό έπαθλο. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: Sports Classics: Worldies
programme.desc: Από τη F1 έως την υψηλή κατάδυση και ένα σωρό άλλα extreme sports, κάθε εκπομπή παρουσιάζει και αναδεικνύει μέσα από 5 βίντεο μερικές από τις πιο απίστευτες στιγμές, διοργανώσεις και αθλητές σε όλα τα σπορ δράσης.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Sailing to the Games 2024
programme.desc: Ακολουθήστε ιστιοπλόους από όλο τον κόσμο καθώς προετοιμάζονται να αγωνιστούν στη μεγαλύτερη αθλητική σκηνή του κόσμου.

programme.title: Τένις: ATP 250 2024
programme.desc: Τελικός. Το ATP Tour 250 είναι η χαμηλότερη βαθμίδα στα τουρνουά τένις ανδρών στο κυρίως ATP Tour. Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Ξαρλής.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Outdoor Specials
programme.desc: Το Outdoor Specials σας φέρνει τα πιο συναρπαστικά γεγονότα στον κόσμο των extreme sports. Από το windsurfing μέχρι την ορειβασία και από την οδήγηση αγώνων μέχρι τις καταδύσεις σπηλαίων, αυτή είναι μια σειρά που θα σας δώσει μια γενναιόδωρη δόση αδρεναλίνης.

programme.title: Τένις: ATP 250 2024
programme.desc: Τελικός. Το ATP Tour 250 είναι η χαμηλότερη βαθμίδα στα τουρνουά τένις ανδρών στο κυρίως ATP Tour. Περιγραφή: Αντρέα Παλομπαρίνι.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Sports Rundown
programme.desc: Ένα συναρπαστικό ταξίδι σε αρένες, γήπεδα, γυμναστήρια και χώρους σε όλο τον κόσμο, όπου αντηχούν οι παλμοί της καρδιάς των αθλημάτων. Οι αθλητές βάζουν τα πάντα σε κάθε άθλημα, αλλά έχετε αναρωτηθεί ποτέ για το άτομο που κρύβεται πίσω από τον αθλητή;.

programme.title: Τένις: ATP 250 2024

programme.desc: Η ιστιοπλοΐα είναι ένα πολύ ξεχωριστό άθλημα. Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: Τένις: ATP 500 2024
programme.desc: Αμβούργο. Τελικός. Τα τουρνουά ATP 500 ανήκουν στην 4η βαθμίδα των ετήσιων διοργανώσεων τένις σε επίπεδο ανδρών. Η σειρά αυτή αποτελείται από 13 τουρνουά, με τον νικητή σε καθένα από αυτά να λαμβάνει 500 πόντους κατάταξης. Περιγραφή: Μαρίζα Γεωργίτση.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: MLB Baseball
programme.sub-title: Boston Red Sox at Los Angeles Dodgers
programme.desc: The Red Sox complete their first trip to Dodger Stadium since winning the 2018 World Series. Boston took Games 1 and 2 before the scene shifted west. The Red Sox lost Game 3 in 18 innings, but claimed Games 4 and 5 to earn a fourth title in 15 years.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. programme.title: Live: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: Live: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Imprisoned on the other side of the universe, the mighty Thor finds himself in a deadly gladiatorial contest that pits him against the Hulk, his former ally and fellow Avenger. Thor's quest for survival leads him in a race against time to prevent the all-powerful Hela from destroying his home world and the Asgardian civilization.

programme.title: The Lazarus Project
programme.desc: When a catastrophic event severely compromises the Lazarus team's plans, George and Sarah must work together to execute their mission and are forced to go head-to-head with an unyielding Wes.

programme.title: The Lazarus Project
programme.desc: When a catastrophic event severely compromises the Lazarus team's plans, George and Sarah must work together to execute their mission and are forced to go head-to-head with an unyielding Wes.

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After the death of his father, T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king. When a powerful enemy suddenly reappears, T'Challa's mettle as king -- and as Black Panther -- gets tested when he's drawn into a conflict that puts the fate of Wakanda and the entire world at risk. Faced with treachery and danger, the young king must rally his allies and release the full power of Black Panther to defeat his foes and secure the safety of his people.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: A secret agent embarks on a dangerous, time-bending mission to prevent the start of World War III.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Pandora's Box falls into the hands of a shape-shifting demon (Michelle Hurd) who intends to open it and release all of its sorrows into the world, sending the sisters on a search for Hope (Brooke Nevin).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A powerful sorceress (Suzanne Krull) casts a spell on Phoebe so their souls switch bodies and Phoebe winds up trapped in the Underworld; Paige is in a quandary when her first charge (Seamus Dever) appears to be lost to the dark side.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Charmed Ones do not realize that baby Wyatt's new imaginary friend is actually the demon Vicus, who is trying to win Wyatt's trust to convert him to evil.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a classmate killed in front of Phoebe comes back from the dead to blame her, she becomes guilt-ridden and vulnerable, creating an opportunity for Zankou to steal the Book of Shadows.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Shortly after Annie Hawkins (Jamie Luner), an old friend and hunter, asks Sam and Dean for help with a case, she disappears.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: The Girl With the Dungeons and Dragons Tattoo
programme.desc: Dick Roman (James Patrick Stuart) acquires a hard drive that contains sensitive information about Dean and Sam; Bobby tries to help the brothers retrieve the hard drive, but his anger toward Dick gets in the way.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Meg contacts Dean and Sam with news that Castiel is conscious and talking; a teenager becomes a reluctant prophet after being struck by lightning.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean and Sam need to find three items if they want to defeat Dick Roman (James Patrick Stuart) and the Leviathans; Bobby's new trick turns out to be very dangerous.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean team up with Castiel, Meg and Bobby as they prepare to battle Dick Roman (James Patrick Stuart).

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft is the fiercely independent daughter of an eccentric adventurer who vanished years earlier. Hoping to solve the mystery of her father's disappearance, Croft embarks on a perilous journey to his last-known destination -- a fabled tomb on a mythical island that might be somewhere off the coast of Japan. The stakes couldn't be higher as Lara must rely on her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit to venture into the unknown.

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Imprisoned on the other side of the universe, the mighty Thor finds himself in a deadly gladiatorial contest that pits him against the Hulk, his former ally and fellow Avenger. Thor's quest for survival leads him in a race against time to prevent the all-powerful Hela from destroying his home world and the Asgardian civilization.

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: Political pressure mounts to install a system of accountability when the actions of the Avengers lead to collateral damage. The new status quo deeply divides members of the team. Captain America (Chris Evans) believes superheroes should remain free to defend humanity without government interference. Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.) sharply disagrees and supports oversight. As the debate escalates into an all-out feud, Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) and Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner) must pick a side.

programme.title: Rich & Shameless
programme.sub-title: Murder, Fixed Fights and the Wannabe Don King
programme.desc: A look into the story of Rick "Elvis" Parker, a boxing promoter and manager who pushed journeyman boxer Tim Anderson to take a dive against former NFL star, Mark Gastineau.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, the city of Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people -- and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur, Orm's half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne. With help from royal counselor Vulko, Arthur must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan and embrace his destiny as protector of the deep sea.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Investigating the fatal shooting of a college student 25 years earlier, the team suspects several former coeds who accused him of date rape.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly tries to determine whether a man's imprisonment in a camp for Japanese-Americans during World War II had any bearing on his murder shortly after his release.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team searches for a serial bomber whose latest attack hit the wrong target.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters try to divert Zankou's attention from the Nexus, but Zankou steals Phoebe's power of premonition, enabling him to anticipate and prevent their attacks.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Presumed dead, the Charmed sisters start their demon-free existence with new identities.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A young demon (Mykel Shannon) trying to take over the Underworld attempts to lure the Charmed Ones out of hiding, and when Billie stumbles onto his plot, she becomes one of his victims.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Piper interviews with a corporate recruiter, a background check reveals that the physical appearance she adopted was that of a woman wanted for murder.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: We Need to Talk About Kevin
programme.desc: When Dean emerges from purgatory, his reunion with Sam isn't what he expected; Kevin escapes from Crowley's grasp.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When Sam and Dean check on Kevin's mother, they discover that Crowley has surrounded her with demons.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a series of murders where the victims all received organs from the same donor; the brothers find the killer in a trance and reciting an ancient prayer.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: As Dean and Sam investigate a strange murder in a college town, they discover two dead bodies and disturbing video footage.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: After Benny is brutally attacked by vampires, he calls Dean for help; Sam reflects on the life with Amelia he left behind.

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: On an island research facility, Dr. Susan McAlester (Saffron Burrows) is harvesting the brain tissue of DNA-altered sharks as a possible cure for Alzheimer's disease. When the facility's backers send an executive (Samuel L. Jackson) to investigate the experiments, a routine procedure goes awry and a shark starts attacking the researchers. Now, with sharks outnumbering their human captors, McAlester and her team must figure out a way to stop them from escaping to the ocean and breeding.

programme.desc: Mnogo je velikih momenata u istoriji jugoslovenskog fudbala, a mi smo izdvojili samo najbolje od najboljeg. Uvek je lepo setiti se tih lepih trenutaka.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarska liga: Septemvri - Beroe
programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona. (LIVE).

programme.desc: Nema više prijateljskih utakmica. Svi se bore za mesto u timu, svi se bore da podignu svoju cenu na fudbalskom tržištu.

programme.title: NASCAR: Indianapolis 400
programme.desc: National Association for Stock Car Auto Racing ili skraćeno NASCAR je najpoznatija automobilska organizacija pod čijom ingerencijom i strogim pravilima se organiziraju auto utrke za tzv. "stock car".

programme.title: Car Fashion
programme.desc: Pratite auto magazin "Car fashion" i saznajte sve o najnovijim trendovima iz automobilske industrije.

programme.title: Odbojka - Liga nacija (M): 1/2 Finale: Poland - France
programme.desc: Pogledajte međunarodne susrete muških odbojkaških reprezentacija koje su članice Međunarodne odbojkaške federacije (FVIB). Takmičenje se odvija u dve faze dok se četiri ekipe ne plasiraju u...

programme.title: F1 Hungaroring: TRKA
programme.desc: Velika nagrada Mađarske je sastavni deo Svetskog prvenstva u Formuli 1. Ovo je takmičenje koje se svake godine održava na Hungaroringu, koji se nalazi u blizini Budimpešte.

programme.title: Profi boks (Birmingham): Magnificent 7
programme.desc: Roki Marčano, Majk Tajson, Šugar Rej Robinson, Muhamed Ali, Džo Luis. Treba li još koji razlog više da bi pratili ovu plemenitu borilačku veštinu? Prve tragove boksa nalazimo već u trećem veku pre...

programme.title: Basket BIG 3: Portland
programme.desc: Basket se sprema za zvanični olimpijski debi. Ruku na srce, nema boljeg basketa nego na terenima Amerike, koji god da je to grad...
